name: The Wingman
description:
'The Wingman' is a 2d game where you got to complete mini games to see how long you can go on for! 

Each mini game has a score attributed to one of three different status bars, keep the score as low as possible!

What features do we have that makes this the best game ever? Easy!

  • We got 6 whole mini games of varying play styles! Mario has only one, thus making this 6 times better than Mario.
  • A score system that's different from that of WarioWare. WarioWare has you completing minigames for a measly high score. But in The Wingman, you gotta manage your resources! Like a cop in America, you gotta learn that your actions have consequences.
  • A variety of colourful characters! (Unless your colourblind) See your character express themselves in a variety of ways
  • You can (Š̶̉ͅi̴̺͔̓̑l̴̟͆ȅ̷̤̳n̷̜͍̍c̴̣̯̈ȩ̵̲̚ ̷͉̪̉̿t̴͇͠h̴͇̄e̴̮͠ ̷̨̠͌v̶͓̌o̵̠̤̐̽i̴̝̓ć̷̠̚ḝ̷͈̀s̶̙̀ ) mute the game! Which for a game of this quality shouldn't be a thing, but the developers were fortunate enough to make an extra human sacrifice so that all that damn noise goes away. (Your mileage may vary based on SFX)

"Oh hey Mr Developer, where can I contact you to tell you how much this game is amazing and/or stupid?" Well I'm glad you asked Mr metaphorical, You can follow me on Twitter at http://www.twitter.com/ickleb_arts Kinda whack huh?
